website_summaries.verdict: Storage times 2: keeping stuff organized doesn't have to be ho-hum, thanks to a sturdy steel blush pink trunk set accessorized with rose gold hardware.
pros: Latch on front has room for a lock (not included)
Decorative as well as functional, providing an attractive way to store items if closet space is limited
Larger trunk has room for bulkier items, such as pillows, blankets, and coats
cons: Some find the rose gold latches more copper in color
Other users thought the smaller case would have more room

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color! However
customer_reviews.text: Blush pink...beautiful color! However, I have two grievances one I thought the trunks would be bigger and I thought it would be like a Pu leather not a metal box like file cabinet metal. But, I do like them and they look great in my living room. Would buy them again but at a sale price.
customer_reviews.author: QUEENNZINGHA

customer_reviews.title: These trunks are seemingly small but I could easily stuff in towels
customer_reviews.text: These trunks are seemingly small but I could easily stuff in towels, bed sheets/pillow covers, a couple dresses I never use, AND TWO COATS.... all of that in just the big trunk. I still have the small trunk empty. I am super pleased with the way they look as well. Previous reviews mention a “beautify” logo on top of the trunk... well they seemed to have replaced that by placing it on the inside of the lid of the trunk. I am just so happy with these; couldn’t be more perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Dhruv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing five sets (10 trunks) in the blush pink. They look amazing lined up on large floating shelves, providing a ton of storage with high style. The trunks are absolutely uniform and all ten arrived quickly and without a single problem -- not so much as a minor dent. Rather, they arrived in perfect condition. Very happy with the product, the service, the company, the packaging, and the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I bought this beautiful case to decorate my room. One thing that I’m confused is that I thought it would come in a pair of a bigger case and a smaller one. But I only received the small one. I wanted to know how can I specially buy the larger one too? Also I believe you guys should specify in the description that it’s only one case and not two. I was very disappointed when only one came in.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Holds my papers
customer_reviews.text: It's stylish n beautiful! It comes with a set of 2 one smaller n tbe other little bigger. These trunks hold a good amount of stuff. I been decluttering papers and this has been such a motivator.I can't wait until I'm done with my papers to display my trunks around a different part of my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Momma bear

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely but I gave them fewer stars because they are very small (smaller than what is pictured). The large size trunk is not the size of a standard trunk so the 2 pieces are actually worth about half the price they are selling for
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: THE CUTEST!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these and instantly brought them as they looked so cute and I have this new thing for the color pink. They were bigger then I thought they would be which I lOVE. Does not come with lock. Really adds some style to my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: The color is one reason I bought this set but they also solved a storage problem in my bedroom. The price is definitely right. Attractive and extremely functional.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Feehan

customer_reviews.title: a little pricey but cute
customer_reviews.text: taking one star off because they did come with some minor cosmetic damage and a bit of a smell. the smell is gone now and they are very cute in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and very functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my play therapy room to put doll clothes and dolls. They are really lovely and seem very sturdy. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: In LOVE! I’ve been eyeing these for a few months & finally decided to pull the plug on them. The reviews that mentioned the size made me nervous before but I was pleasantly surprised. They are much larger than I expected. Cant wait to tie my room together with these beauties.
customer_reviews.author: Allura

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: I recently had flood water in my home. I lost lots of property. I saw this set and decided to use as a start to my remodel. They are beautiful. Blush pink.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Z.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODCUT
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on these for a long time and finally bought them and I am so glad I did! I was SO surprised the quality was so nice. AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful storage items for your room!
customer_reviews.text: The two trunks arrived today, and I love them so much! I ordered the brush color ones because the color goes well with my room. Now I have something to store my things and look cute! Absolutely love these items!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Evans

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and multi-functional!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Came as pictured and perfect for storing my hats and scarves. They work as a sweet little stacked table as well. Love love love these!
customer_reviews.author: samplethechaii

customer_reviews.title: These trunks are very pretty with the pink and rose gold finishes
customer_reviews.text: These trunks are very pretty with the pink and rose gold finishes. Also, they are very sturdy solid metal and the finish seems to be baked on enamel. They are well worth the price. I use mine to store sewing notions in the small trunk and material in the larger trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Hello Lovlies
customer_reviews.text: Adorable blush pink storage trunks. I’m using mine for storing beauty products. They seem pretty darn sturdy considering my box arrived completely banged up and with some large holes. The trunks arrived undamaged. If you are thinking of buying them - just do it. I’m happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: RosewaterV

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been thinking about getting these for a while and I finally just gave in. I love them. They’re a little small but very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These match my bed set perfectly! I bought these for my art supply. They hold everything perfectly. The color is cute. You can find these on wayfair 50 dollars cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old daughter LOVED these on Christmas morning! She picked them out online for her dorm room next fall but seeing them in person was even better. Great quality. She is already storing her smaller college décor in them..
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cavallo

customer_reviews.title: Fun and practical
customer_reviews.text: Using them as a coffee table. Extra storage, easy to clean, and fun. Planning on some possible fun magnets for notes.. instead of the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: They're as described but you get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: They're as described but you get what you pay for. The boxes are a bit flimsy and the hinges don't seem durable. And the box says "Beauty" on the top...loudly. But. For a young girl's birthday, hopefully they're adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Great addition to my studio
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, Great addition to my studio. I live in 283 sq ft and needed something to store my blankets and junk I 'd rather keep out of sight. be careful how you move them, however, easily marked. really adds that pop of color I was looking for and short enough stacked to fit on under any desk.
customer_reviews.author: Meika

customer_reviews.title: So classy!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these as a "hope chest"/ "memory "chest for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were still the same price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these beautiful Pink Rose Gold Storage trunk in 2018 as a gift for my niece which are absolutely gorgeous! Why I didn’t give it a 5 star is because I was going to Re-purchase today and the price went up $40. Found the Exact same trunks on Wayfair for $105.
customer_reviews.author: 2poopooMonsters

customer_reviews.title: #1 very nice and pink is perfect
customer_reviews.text: #1 very nice and pink is perfect..#2 Large one holds queen overstuffed comforter! Small one holds 5 twin sheet sets and extra blanket for twin bed
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. I bought to put my daughters baby things in to keep them safe.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Little Trunks!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little trunks! One thing buyers may want to know is they are a type of tin material. Not a bad thing at all just not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, just like in the picture. Added the right touch to my bedroom, not too big, great for smaller places or fit perfectly at end of a platform bed. Great for storing sheets and light bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So I loved them at first but they have rust on them now and they dent easy I still use and love them
customer_reviews.author: LaDeliah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: True to color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE the color! So pretty and a great price compared to other trunks I've seen which were just black and very expensive just for one.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabirdie

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: the quality is not good because it is a bit fragile, but I like it because it has good storage, good decoration
customer_reviews.author: Monik

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low to find trunks like these in a beautiful color that also had rose gold hardware AND would ship to the USA. I did indeed find the same product for sale at CB2 in black and white for almost double the price! I was so excited when I ran across this store on Amazon...These are amazing, great quality and they look so chic in any room. I planned on using mine specifically in my kids room but they also look great in the living room. I'm definitely buying more in the cream and gray color. Buy them before they're all gone!
customer_reviews.author: nycgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keepsakes !!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for value. Beautiful and functional. Packaged very good so no worries about dents.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.B Recommends

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: Love them but the larger one was delivered broken on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful trunks ever, great packaging. The product was immaculate. I’m more than happy with this item, it’s beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: jesica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Don’t be alarmed the smaller one comes inside the bigger case. It’s not as big as I thought it would be but it is definitely deep and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphira Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great to use as storage while looking very stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these trunks! Very versatile, can be used as storage or home decor.

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed at both the size (smaller than I thought) and quality. It's cheap looking and for $120 I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Coolidge

customer_reviews.title: Came with a huge dent!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and usable, however one of the trucks came with a huge dent in it! Disappointed but still functional.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and price. Very cute. I've gotten lots of compliments.

customer_reviews.title: This a really small trunk . Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The size was really small and the material is very thin a complete ripoff
customer_reviews.author: WANDA R.

customer_reviews.title: I do wish the trunks had a clear coat as well for extra Durability
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, love both the blush pink and copper & the white and champagne. Just Gorgeous. It was worth the price and got here fast love the.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy :(

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: trunks are excellent sizes, very well balanced color palette without being overt and they look beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: great addition to any decor
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made, great addition to any decor.

customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful! Very well made and lots of storage space.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was really cute. Not as a big as I imagined but still cute and love that it actually has storage and isn't "just for decoration"

customer_reviews.title: It came very well packed.
customer_reviews.text: It came very well packed. No dents or marks. I love the color is just as the picture.

customer_reviews.title: a scratch?!?
customer_reviews.text: Its very pretty, but a bit smaller than expected. Came with a scratch on top of the bigger one, but good for the money and will come in handy with storage in my dorm and the colors match my theme perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Love love love

customer_reviews.title: So gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in blush pink and they have made my living room pop! The rose gold is such a stand out and it is so pretty and shiny in person!!

customer_reviews.title: I am SO happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with these. I use them as storage for socks and pajamas and they look fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Trunks

product_meta.title: Beautify Footlocker Trunks College Dorm Chests Blush Pink Vintage Style Steel Metal Storage Trunk Set Lockable and Decorative with Rose Gold Handles For Bedroom, Hallway, Living Room
feature_bullets: VINTAGE STYLE: Set of 2 vintage-style storage trunks – a sophisticated addition to any home
SPACIOUS: Perfect for storing bedding, towels, clothes, shoes, toys, magazines, paper documents and general bits and bobs
TRUNKS SET: Comprises one small trunk measuring L20.4" x W10.2" x H7.8" inches and one large trunk measuring L23.6" x W14.1"x H9.4" inches
ROBUST STEEL: Made from robust steel with on-trend rose gold clasps and handle
GIFT IDEA: Great housewarming, birthday or Christmas gift idea

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
